theColorName.scss

View on GitHub

theColorNames.scss

This library contain a SCSS mixin with all 142 CSS color names:

@mixin tcn($property, $color) {
  #{$property}: $color;
}

For example:

@each $color in $colors {
  .theColorName {
    &.--#{$color} {
      @include tcn(color, $color);
    }
  }
}

Will compile to:

.theColorName.--Tomato {
  color: Tomato;
}

And the HTML:

<p class="theColorName --Tomato">I'm not a cucumber!</p>

All 142 colors:
